title: Tyne, The urban huntmaster
body:
Its a story of a monster catcher who travels from city to city hunting for large sums of money. then something happens that gives him reason to hunt them for more then just money.

Anyway for the cool bits

Stats
technical stuff for a fragile, annoying as f*** duelist assassin

Passive: Persistent opportunity, think you have got away, think again. hitting enemies with one of Tyne's abilities allows him to track them for the next five seconds as they leave a trail. Unfortunately you only see the trail if it is in your vision and your teammates cant see it if you aren't around.

q: Stalking ambusher, 10 secs, Tyne will mark a nearby enemy champion (within vision or not) granting local vision. his next attack against them so long as he remains out of sight will fear the enemy for 1.25 seconds, guarantee a critical strike and life tap them for 4 seconds (basic attacks regaining %2 of your max health over 3 seconds, you know like shen) 

w: Hidden weakness, 14 secs, everyone has a secret sore spot and Tyne is most adapt at exploiting this. Tynes next attack exposes that weakness of the next enemy champion or neutral monster causing basic attacks to echo 5%/15%/20%/30%/40% of damage dealt to them (40% of damage is re dealt after initial damage ) for the next 7 seconds

e: Easy prey, 6 secs, Tyne will throw a boomerang at an enemy champion, dealing 40 physical (20% AD) damage and knocking them in a random direction away from Tyne. For the next 4 seconds that champion deals 2%/5%/10%/20%/30% reduced damage and is slowed by 30%

r: Hunter's Prowess, 140 secs/120 secs/90 secs, Tyne grants global vision of all enemy champions and all damage against them will cause them to bleed 6%,/8%/10% of their max health over 8 seconds

replies.body: That ult makes me think of his guys ult> {{champion:30}}

oh, does nocturne ult remind you of karth? oh while we're at it let me know if any of these other champs remind you of karth ult
ezreal
ashe
draven
twisted fate
because these are all global and it must mean its like karthus ult right?

its not about it being global...

that ult targets all champions....very much like karthus.

whereas noct denies vision for all enemies, but thats not very much like karthus. and then a single target dash to someone in a reduced global range. again, not very karthus.

those others, 3 are globals but not very karthus in any way. and then 1 is again, reduced global range and nothing like karthus.

im beginning to think you are %%%%%%ed...everything you post is %%%% posting and wrong.

tbh, the champ is kinda "weird" if you get what i mean.

But i like the ult.
